      (aka 'ArrayRef<int64_t>')

                   ^~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

      not viable: no known conversion from 'std::vector<long>' to 'const at::ArrayRef<long long> &' for 1st argument

        ^

                 ^
